alert.note: Alert for Coastal Chatham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 7:48PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 748 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Richmond Hill, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph and excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Pooler, Richmond Hill, Coffee Bluff, I-16/I-95 Interchange, Windsor Forest, Hunter Army Airfield, Garden City and Burroughs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Chatham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham
